author: Pomax
content:
#And so, finally, a blog


I am not a fan of most blogging software, because it requires too much work. If it's not "hit 'new post' button, done", it's frankly too much work for me. And as it turns out, I now have exactly what I want, using the magic of GitHub's "user.github.io" concept, the "octokits.js" library for interfacing with github from the browser, and
